article_text:
George Frey/Getty Images

A next-generation Internet-connected device like the Nest thermostat is only as valuable as the analytics inside and around it, says Guest Columnist Thomas A. Davenport. “The Internet of Things is only useful if those things are smart, and that will happen through The Analytics of Things,” he writes.

"The Internet of Things is only useful if those things are smart, and that will happen through The Analytics of Things," he writes.
